title: What is the famous line from The Princess Bride? - Quora

response.answer_text: The famous line? My dear, The Princess Bride is the most quotable movie ever made in English. Many people can quote pretty much the entire thing. Here are just a few— Wesley: “As you wish.” Vizzinni: “Inconceivable!Inigo Montoya: “You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means.” Vizzini: “Never go against a Sicilian when death is on the line!” Westley: “I told you I would always come for you. Why didn't you wait for me?”Buttercup: “Well ... you were dead.”Westley: “Death cannot stop true love. All it can do is delay it for a while.” The Impressive Clergyman: “Mawage. Mawage is wot bwings us togeder today. Mawage, that bwessed awangment, that dweam wifin a dweam ... And wuv, tru wuv, will fowow you foweva ... So tweasure your wuv.” Westley: “Life is pain. Anyone who says different is trying to sell you something.” Miracle Max the Wizard: “He's only mostly dead. If he were all dead, there's only one thing you can do.”Inigo Montoya: And what's that?Miracle Max the Wizard: Go through his pockets and look for loose change. Valerie the Wizard's Wife: “Bye bye boys!”Miracle Max the Wizard: “Have fun stormin' da castle.”Valerie the Wizard's Wife: “Think it'll work?”Miracle Max the Wizard: “It would take a miracle.” Inigo Montoya: “Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die.” Inigo: “You know, It's very strange. I have been in the revenge business so long, now that it's over, I don't know what to do with the rest of my life.”Westley: “Have you ever considered piracy? You'd make a wonderful dread pirate Roberts.” Grandfather: Okay. "Since the invention of the kiss, there have been five kisses that were rated the most passionate, the most pure. This one left them all behind.

Several come to mind: As you wish Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die. He’s only mostly dead You fell victim to one of the classic blunders - The most famous of which is 'never get involved in a land war in Asia' - but only slightly less well-known is this: 'Never go against a Sicilian when death is on the line!' Inconcievable!! You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means. Death cannot stop true love. All it can do is delay it for a while. I’m not a witch, I’m your wife! A popular line to make into a meme is: Alright, now let’s see, where were we? Oh, yes. In the pit of despair. And of course, the wedding ceremony. Mawwage. Mawwage is what bwings us togevah today. Mawwage, dat bwessed awwangement. Dat dweam wivvin a dweam. Wuv, twue wuv wiww fowwow you fowevah. So tweasure your wuv… Basically every line in this movie is pure gold.
